professional_summary: Proficient in SQL Server administration, data warehousing, business intelligence tools, performance tuning, and high availability solutions with extensive experience in database management and ETL processes.

key_responsibilities: Increased user and data security by implementing SQL logins
Directed the deployment of database objects and structure changes across multiple environments.
Monitored SQL Server to eliminate deadlocks and resolve performance issues.
Implemented performance tuning using SQL Profiler and Database Tuning Advisor.
and scheduled jobs to verify operations.
Performed database consistency checks at regular intervals.
Designed and implemented high availability solutions.
Fine-tuned indexes and constraints on tables to optimize performance.
Resolved deadlocks and optimized T-SQL statements using Query Analyzer.
